short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple, private and customizable link shortener.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "RadziLink - Url Shortener" is a fast and convenient Google Chrome extension that makes it easy to shorten and customize your links. With this tool, you can set a custom URL for your links, add a password for extra security, and even choose to have the link expire after a certain amount of time or after the first use. Whether you want to share your links on social media, in an email, or on your website, RadziLink makes it simple to get the job done. Try it out today and see how it can streamline your link-sharing process and keep your online activities organized and secure.
